hero.subtitle: Prachi Jindal
hero.heading: Building reliable, human-centered digital and embedded products.
hero.lead: I'm an Electrical Engineering student at IIT Delhi and software engineer focused on marrying embedded intelligence with intuitive web experiences. From prototyping machine learning workflows to shipping full-stack products, I craft resilient systems that feel effortless to use.
hero.imageCaption: Software Engineer joining Stripe in 2026. Building reliable, user-centered products.

highlights.subtitle: Impact At A Glance
highlights.heading: Delivering measurable value across domains
highlights.description: I thrive on solving hard technical problems, scaling product teams, and turning ambiguous ideas into resilient, user-loved solutions.

cta.description: Whether you need an embedded ML prototype, a data-driven automation pipeline, or a crafted digital product, I bring curiosity, care, and bias for action to every engagement.
